name: Persuasive
entries: You truly have a talent for persuading people to do what you say.

items: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

If you speak to a creature that can understand you for at least 1 minute, you can try to manipulate it. At the end of the conversation, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against a DC equal to {@dc 8} + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (your choice) or another creature you choose. The target is charmed or frightened in this way for 1 hour, until it is attacked or damaged, or until it witnesses its allies being attacked or damaged. This is not a magical effect.
